tool.name: Extract individuals list

param.name: vcf_input
param.label: Upload your VCF file
param.help: File containing SNP data in VCF format. You can upload a simple file, multiple file or a dataset collection.

tool.help:
Usage =====
As input, the user provides a single VCF file (Danecek *et al.* 2011).
The tool processes the VCF and extracts all the individuals IDs present in the file. The output is a simple tabular file containing one individual per line.
Example: If the input VCF contains individuals id_A, id_B, id_C, id_D, the output will be a list containing:
::
id_A id_B id_C id_D
The list of individuals does not contain a header, and there is only one individual per line. This output can be used directly as input for other tools, such as "Keep selected individuals from a VCF" tool.
See also examples of VCF formats in : https://samtools.github.io/hts-specs/VCFv4.5.pdf
